text: THE WALLET OF KAI LUNG
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: By Ernest Bramah
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "Ho, illustrious passers-by!" says Kai Lung as he spreads out his
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: embroidered mat under the mulberry-tree. "It is indeed unlikely
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: that you could condescend to stop and listen to the foolish words
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: of such an insignificant and altogether deformed person as myself.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: Nevertheless, if you will but retard your elegant footsteps for a
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: few moments, this exceedingly unprepossessing individual will
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: endeavour to entertain you." This is a collection of Kai Lung's
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: entertaining tales, told professionally in the market places as he
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: travelled about; told sometimes to occupy and divert the minds of
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: his enemies when they were intent on torturing him.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: The sun had dipped behind the western mountains before Kai Lung, with
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: twenty li or more still between him and the city of Knei Yang, entered
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: the camphor-laurel forest which stretched almost to his destination.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: No person of consequence ever made the journey unattended; but Kai Lung
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: professed to have no fear, remarking with extempore wisdom, when warned
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: at the previous village, that a worthless garment covered one with
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: better protection than that afforded by an army of bowmen. Nevertheless,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: when within the gloomy aisles, Kai Lung more than once wished himself
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: back at the village, or safely behind the mud walls of Knei Yang; and,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: making many vows concerning the amount of prayer-paper which he would
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: assuredly burn when he was actually through the gates, he stepped
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: altogether, while the watchful expression into which he had unguardedly
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: dropped at once changed into a mask of impassiveness and extreme
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: unconcern. From behind the next tree projected a long straight rod, not
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: unlike a slender bamboo at a distance, but, to Kai Lung's all-seeing
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: eye, in reality the barrel of a matchlock, which would come into line
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: with his breast if he took another step. Being a prudent man, more
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: accustomed to guile and subservience to destiny than to force, he
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: therefore waited, spreading out his hands in proof of his peaceful
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: acquiescence, and smiling cheerfully until it should please the owner
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: of the weapon to step forth. This the unseen did a moment later, still
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: body and a scarred face, which in conjunction made it plain to Kai Lung
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: that he was in the power of Lin Yi, a noted brigand of whom he had heard
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: much in the villages.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "O illustrious person," said Kai Lung very earnestly, "this is evidently
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: an unfortunate mistake. Doubtless you were expecting some exalted
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: him with gratified confusion by escorting him yourself to your
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: well-appointed abode. Indeed, I passed such a one on the road, very
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: richly apparelled, who inquired of me the way to the mansion of the
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: dignified and upright Lin Yi. By this time he is perhaps two or three li
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: towards the east."
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "However distinguished a Mandarin may be, it is fitting that I should
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: first attend to one whose manners and accomplishments betray him to be
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: of the Royal House," replied Lin Yi, with extreme affability. "Precede
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: me, therefore, to my mean and uninviting hovel, while I gain more
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: honour than I can reasonably bear by following closely in your elegant
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: footsteps, and guarding your Imperial person with this inadequate but
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: heavily-loaded weapon."
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: Seeing no chance of immediate escape, Kai Lung led the way, instructed
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: by the brigand, along a very difficult and bewildering path, until they
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: reached a cave hidden among the crags. Here Lin Yi called out some words
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: in the Miaotze tongue, whereupon a follower appeared, and opened a gate
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: in the stockade of prickly mimosa which guarded the mouth of the den.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: Within the enclosure a fire burned, and food was being prepared. At a
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: word from the chief, the unfortunate Kai Lung found his hands seized and
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: tied behind his back, while a second later a rough hemp rope was fixed
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: round his neck, and the other end tied to an overhanging tree.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: Lin Yi smiled pleasantly and critically upon these preparations, and
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: when they were complete dismissed his follower.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "Now we can converse at our ease and without restraint," he remarked to
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: Kai Lung. "It will be a distinguished privilege for a person occupying
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: the important public position which you undoubtedly do; for myself,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: my instincts are so degraded and low-minded that nothing gives me more
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: gratification than to dispense with ceremony."
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: To this Kai Lung made no reply, chiefly because at that moment the wind
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: swayed the tree, and compelled him to stand on his toes in order to
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: escape suffocation.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "It would be useless to try to conceal from a person of your inspired
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: intelligence that I am indeed Lin Yi," continued the robber. "It is a
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: dignified position to occupy, and one for which I am quite incompetent.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: In the sixth month of the third year ago, it chanced that this unworthy
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: person, at that time engaged in commercial affairs at Knei Yang, became
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: inextricably immersed in the insidious delights of quail-fighting.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: purchase elephants' teeth, it suddenly occurred to him that if he
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: doubled the number of taels by staking them upon an exceedingly powerful
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: and agile quail, he would be able to purchase twice the number of teeth,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: and so benefit his patron to a large extent. This matter was clearly
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: forced upon his notice by a dream, in which he perceived one whom he
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: then understood to be the benevolent spirit of an ancestor in the act
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: of stroking a particular quail, upon whose chances he accordingly
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: matter; for, to this person's great astonishment, the quail in question
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: him, but all that he had himself become possessed of by some years of
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: the presence of the larger sum, and a generous desire to benefit his
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: patron, he would never have risked in so uncertain a venture as that of
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: request instead of a demand by legal means, and the reasoning carefully
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: When these matters were arranged, Ling returned to his tent, a victim
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: to feelings of a deep and confused doubt, for all courses seemed to
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: be surrounded by extreme danger, with the strong possibility of final
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: disaster. While he was considering these things attentively, the spy who
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: had brought word of the presence of the enemy again sought him. As he
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: entered, Ling perceived that his face was the colour of a bleached linen
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: garment, while there came with him the odour of sickness.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "There are certain matters which this person has not made known," he
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: said, having first expressed a request that he might not be compelled to
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: stand while he conversed. "The bowmen are as an inferior kind of jackal,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: and they who lead them are pigs, but this person has observed that the
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: Heaven-sent Commander has internal organs like steel hardened in a white
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: fire and polished by running water. For this reason he will narrate
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: to him the things he has seen--things at which the lesser ones would
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: undoubtedly perish in terror without offering to strike a blow."
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "Speak," said Ling, "without fear and without concealment."
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: "In numbers the rebels are as three to one with the bowmen, and are,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: in addition, armed with matchlocks and other weapons; this much I have
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: already told," said the spy. "Yesterday they entered the village of Ki
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: without resistance, as the dwellers there were all peaceable persons,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: who gain a living from the fields, and who neither understood nor
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: troubled about the matters between the rebels and the army. Relying on
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: the promises made by the rebel chiefs, the villagers even welcomed them,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: as they had been assured that they came as buyers of their corn and
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: rice. To-day not a house stands in the street of Ki, not a person lives.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: The men they slew quickly, or held for torture, as they desired at the
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: moment; the boys they hung from the trees as marks for their arrows.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: Of the women and children this person, who has since been subject to
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: several attacks of fainting and vomiting, desires not to speak. The
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: wells of Ki are filled with the bodies of such as had the good fortune
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: to be warned in time to slay themselves. The cattle drag themselves from
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: place to place on their forefeet; the fish in the Heng-Kiang are dying,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: for they cannot live on water thickened into blood. All these things
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: this person has seen."

author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: hand-to-hand fighting. He regretted that he had placed the decision of
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: the matter before Li Keen.
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: fate," he murmured to himself.

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

text: succeed by the Forty-second Mandate in the Sacred Book of Arguments.

author: Bramah, Ernest

text: of Bowmen, make an especial and well-considered request that he shall be

text: of treachery."

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

text: Between Si-chow and the village of Ki, in a house completely hidden from
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

author: Bramah, Ernest

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: choice dishes of an objectionable nature; he had been observed to eat
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: eggs of unbecoming freshness, and the Si-chow Official Printed Leaf made
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: it public that he had, on an excessively hot occasion, openly partaken
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: of cow's milk. It is not a matter for wonder, therefore, that when
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: unnaturally loud thunder was heard in the neighbourhood of Si-chow
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

text: the more ignorant and credulous persons refused to continue in any
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

text: description of work until certain ceremonies connected with rice spirit,
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
author: Bramah, Ernest

text: and the adherence to a reclining position for some hours, had been

author: Bramah, Ernest

text: conscientiously observed as a protection against evil.

text: "When a virtuous maiden has been made the victim of a heartless jest or
title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung

text: "With this Tien returns everything she has ever accepted from Kin Yen.

title: The Wallet of Kai Lung
